Source.Name: stoken
Source.Summary: stoken is a tokencode generator compatible with RSA SecurID 128-bit (AES) tokens
Source.Description: stoken is a tokencode generator compatible with RSA SecurID 128-bit (AES) tokens. The libstoken shared librairy can be use with openconnect
